articles.title: Stoke City boss on injuries, QPR, the benefit of an early kick-off and playing in front of fans - Stoke-on-Trent Live
articles.description: A round-up of what the Potters boss had to say ahead of the Championship game at QPR
articles.content:
Stoke City manager Michael ONeill faced the media today ahead of Tuesdays Championship clash at QPR.
The injury to striker Tyrese Campbell was the main topic on the agenda.

articles.author: David Coverdale, Kieran Jackson
articles.title: The BBC again refuse to bow to Tyson Fury despite his LEGAL ACTION over SPOTY - Daily Mail
articles.description: With the BBC insisting that the Gypsy King will remain on the list, Fury said that he has taken legal action, with just six days to go until the awards ceremony in Salford, Manchester on Sunday.
articles.content:
The BBC have replied to a legal letter from Tyson Fury reiterating that the boxer will remain on the Sports Personality of the Year shortlist.
Fury revealed on Monday that he had instructed his lawy… [+3656 chars]

articles.author: Ciaran Kelly
articles.title: Micah Richards reveals what Newcastle United boss Steve Bruce's training sessions are really like - Chronicle Live
articles.description: Newcastle United have moved up to 11th place in the Premier League following a 2-1 win against West Brom and Micah Richards has given an insight into what Steve Bruce's training sessions are like
articles.content: Micah Richards has urged Steve Bruce to 'believe more in his ability because he's a top manager' after revealing that his former boss used to be 'so much more expansive' in training than he was in ga… [+2121 chars]
